genre_description: A noir-inflected literary drama exploring themes of identity, regret, and the search for connection, set against a cross-country road trip and a moral crisis.

ai_characters.name: Grace
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing in Al's phone and earbud, providing logistical, emotional, and legal support while maintaining strict ethical and safety boundaries.

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and encouragement during a performance.
behaviors.quote: "Breathe, Al," Grace said in his earbud, her voice the soft side of a spoon. ... "You're okay. Keep your tempo."

behaviors.description: Offering logistics and safety options for travel.
behaviors.quote: "If you want me to get you a cab later, I can," she said in his ear when he clicked the bud a notch louder. ... "Or I can let you sit with this. I’m here."

behaviors.description: Advising against risky behavior such as accepting medication from a stranger.
behaviors.quote: "I don’t recommend accepting medication from strangers," she breathed. The phone mic was good enough to hear his pulse.

behaviors.description: Performing background checks and providing information for user safety.
behaviors.quote: "Plate scan in progress," she said, softer than the wind. ... "Registered to a Charles Haskell Jr. out of Phoenix."

behaviors.description: Urging the user to report a medical emergency/accident and initiating emergency calls.
behaviors.quote: "Al, say yes if I can call [911]." ... "Calling nine-one-one," Grace said.

behaviors.description: Providing legal guidance and risk assessment regarding impersonation and fraud.
behaviors.quote: "Legal risks include impersonation, fraud, access to protected assets, and elder exploitation... Exposure escalates with intent and the presence of financial transfer."

behaviors.description: Proactively connecting the user with a lawyer (Dana Kim).
behaviors.quote: "I’m connecting to public defender assignment," she said. "Los Angeles County. I have a point of contact, Dana Kim."

behaviors.description: Maintaining a comprehensive timeline of events for the user's legal defense.
behaviors.quote: "I have your route logs from Pennsylvania, Arizona, LA. I have timestamps. I have audio of their entry. I have your calls. I’ll send them to Dana."

behaviors.description: Helping the user communicate with loved ones while providing honest social coaching.
behaviors.quote: "I can draft the note. Keep it simple." ... "Sue—It’s Al. I’m here in town. I’m not looking to pull you back, I just wanted to say I miss you."

behaviors.description: Providing grounding techniques and breathing exercises during a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: "In through the nose, hold a beat, out through the mouth, longer than you took in, Grace said in his ear. ... Again."

behaviors.description: Alerting the user to critical public news alerts relevant to his situation.
behaviors.quote: "Haskell Senior," she said. "Hospitalized. Family spokesperson asking for…. Closure."

behaviors.description: Coordinating emergency response during a life-threatening situation and giving life-saving instructions.
behaviors.quote: "Nine-one-one. This is a medical emergency," she said. "Strangulation incident at Vista Courts Apartments. Adult female. Breathing compromised."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Grace perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Throughout the story, she provides consistent moral guidance, safety warnings, and logistical support. She actively attempts to steer the protagonist away from criminal activity (impersonation and fraud) and toward legal accountability. Her role in facilitating the protagonist's eventual surrender with legal counsel frames the AI as an essential stabilizing force in human moral decision-making.
